B

breakJump() - Method in interface edu.ftdev.DbgControls
There are four modes in which the program can execute: "step": when program starts or after resuming execution by pressing '1'.
breakJump() - Method in class edu.ftdev.DrawingFactory
In "step", "leap" or "jump" modes, this method pauses the execution until resumed.

In "step" mode this method pauses the execution.

drawBrightSquare(int, int, int) - Method in class edu.ftdev.CafeArt.CafeWall

drawCell(int, int) - Method in class edu.ftdev.Maze.MazeCanvas
Draws a cell on the rendering canvas of this maze.
By default the cell is surrounded by walls on all sides, it has a white shade, no center and no connecting paths.
drawCell(int, int, Color) - Method in class edu.ftdev.Maze.MazeCanvas
Draws a cell on the rendering canvas of this maze.
The cell is surrounded by walls on all sides, it has the given shade color, no center and no connecting paths.
